name: Panpollenia
description:
Panpollenia is currently an early version made for Casual Fortnight 3

Wanna be a bee? Wanna be a bee in space? Wanna be a bee in space populating the universe with goofy space plants? You should probably talk to either Elon Musk or your psychiatrist about these strange fantasies.

If you wanna pretend to be those things though, this is the game for you!

Coming soon:

  • Story!
  • Goals relating to the story!
  • More fleshed out environment!
  • More fleshed out interactions between plants and the world!
  • More plants!
  • More BeeDA programs!
  • Other!
  • Anything else you want to suggest!
